title: Upcoming best Kata AU looking for a duo jungle, top or adc.
body:
Wanting a jungle to duo with so we can fly threw ranks, Needs coms and above silver. Gold-Plat.
IGN: Kitty Katt

replies.body: No one wants to enable a Katarina player.
I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.
You will begin in bronze and end in bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=SoFlo GoneSexual,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gU91R5W4,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-21T15:36:00.481+0000)
>
> You will begin in bronze and end in bronze.

This. Kat gets destroyed in anything above. Kat only beats the oblivious mid players.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gU91R5W4,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-22T06:14:00.876+0000)
>
> This. Kat gets destroyed in anything above. Kat only beats the oblivious mid players.

There's Katarina mains in Challenger on multiple servers and she's enjoyed in SoloQ by players such as Faker, Scarra and Bjergsen.

The thing is those challenger kats know what the heck they are doing and know when to play her in different styles. 

Example. A good kat knows that if they have heavy CC just sit back and dont go in until well into the fight. Where most okay or just good kats just run in and get destroyed like i said. 

Also as i also said. The only way a kat wins mid is if you picked a easy kill for her mid, or if you are just horrible at mid. She has so many counter picks in mid it isn't funny.
